mapper.sql: id, name, password, address, phone, mail, role, money, regTime
mapper.insert:

id,
name,
password,
address,
phone,
mail,
role,

regTime,

mapper.update:
update user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER},
money = #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER},
regTime = #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, regTime = #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
